intro: Banisteria stellaris f. latifolia, commonly known as the broadleaf star-banisteria, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Rubiaceae. It is characterized by its distinctive star-shaped flowers that bloom in clusters, typically in shades of white and pink. The plant features broad, ovate leaves with a smooth texture and a slightly waxy appearance. Native to tropical regions of South America, it thrives in warm, humid environments. Due to its ornamental value, it is often cultivated in gardens and greenhouses for its visual appeal.
